mapper.select: select if(max(replyBoard_no) is null, 1, (select max(replyBoard_no) from ReplyBoards)) from ReplyBoards;
mapper.insert: insert into ReplyBoards(board_no, member_id, replyBoard_content, replyBoard_ref, replyBoard_step, replyBoard_refOrder) values(#{board_no}, #{member_id}, #{replyBoard_content}, #{replyBoard_ref}, #{replyBoard_step} + 1, #{replyBoard_refOrder} + 1);
mapper.update: update ReplyBoards set replyBoard_content = #{replyBoard_content} where replyBoard_no = #{replyBoard_no};
mapper.select: select * from ReplyBoards where board_no = #{board_no} order by replyBoard_ref asc, replyBoard_refOrder asc;
